itunes:summary:
California has outlawed gas-powered cars starting in 2035,  Joe Biden has forgiven $10,000 of student debt for people making under $125,000 a year, and Pennsylvania Senate candidate John Fetterman’s stroke symptoms were unfortunately obvious during a recent campaign speech.
